creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama in honor of William "Bill" Clark, visionary and passionate collector of Japanese art and a generous benefactor to the Minneapolis Institute of Art
description: thick growth of lotus leaves rendered in gray and black; whitish lotus blossoms and buds with slight trace of pink; four large panels create the image
image_copyright: © Minol Araki%2C licensed by David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
markings: 2 seals LRC of panel d. Square seal: 荒木實 [Araki Minoru]; Rectangular seal: 碧琶 [Hekiba]
medium: Ink and color on paper mounted on panels
signed: signed LRC of panel d: 荒木實 [Araki Minoru]
title: Lotus Pond
